title: Context-Aware Task Decomposer Tool
description: Develop a tool that uses advanced NLP and code analysis to automatically decompose complex user directives or tasks into granular subtasks, populating the global task list with structured entries.
benefits: Improves task clarity and granularity, reducing manual breakdown efforts
Accelerates swarm productivity by generating actionable subtasks instantly
Ensures consistency in task formatting and reduces human errors
tasks: Design and prototype an NLP pipeline to parse and extract subtask definitions from user directives
Integrate with the existing context_planner for step-level planning and subtask creation
Implement file-based APIs to write new subtasks into task_list.json with proper locking
Write unit and integration tests to validate decomposition accuracy and JSON consistency
